function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges related to legal concerns and ethics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bias in favoring large ict corporations in the implementation of smart city products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Local smes in the ict sector are overlooked for opportunities in data collection, storage, and computation, which are mostly handled by large corporations in smart cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Digital non-taxation regimes in different countries benefit large corporations, depriving local smes in the ict sector of fair competition and market access.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Post-covid-19 stimulus packages and strategies favor the embrace of new digital technologies, potentially creating a competitive advantage for larger politico-financed competitors over local smes in the ict sector.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cessation of the world trade organisation wto moratorium on custom duties for electronic transmissions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing rate of transactions coupling data and financial","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergence of new market-based instruments riding on the blockchain network","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development and application of 6g technology without considering health implications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of sustainability in the design and manufacturing of iot devices","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to crowded urban built environments","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities due to the pandemic","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global economic impact and recession due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in urban environments","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of recognition and consideration of pandemics in urban planning and architectural professional institutions.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mosquito-infested swamplands in post-wwi and spanish flu eras","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disease-infested environments in densely populated urban areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid and widespread virus spread despite quarantine and lockdown measures.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to global travel and trade","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases such as zika, h1n1, and covid-19 leading to social and political tensions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide compensation to affected businesses during health crises","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extreme measures taken by citizens to prevent the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of planning and management leading to ostracism, racism, and social conflict","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hoarding of basic commodities and spreading fear","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe economic losses and decline in tourism due to pandemic measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emergency preparedness in urban areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of non-medical spaces into medical facilities during outbreaks","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelmed medical facilities during outbreaks","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of outbreaks on urban functionality","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled data collection and storage leading to privacy and security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High volume of data increasing the risk of data overload and mismanagement.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Segregation of information in the urban realm within independent private corporations and government bodies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Configuration of sensor devices by contracted corporations to be incompatible with those of their competitors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cross-usage of data in monitoring internal country travel, leading to inadequate tracking of community dispersals and contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardization of protocols and networks for urban technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster management policy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of disease propagation in disaster-affected areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Architects and urban planners not being involved in pandemic planning and response","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of emergency response as an engineering challenge rather than a design challenge","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient time to plan and design pandemic response infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster management protocols for architectural and urban institutions for biological disasters like disease epidemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness and response to pandemics despite the availability of modern technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited consideration of bio-risk management in architectural and urban planning","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization of protocols for seamless communication in the healthcare sector","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of pandemic preparedness in urban planning and architecture","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited capacity to build emergency facilities and support basic survival needs in least developed/developing economies","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale spread of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacy of medical staff and resources in severe areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of 5g application scenarios","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"5g-enabled ultrasound may lead to misdiagnosis and inappropriate treatment of patients.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
